statements: UPDATE charging_stations SET location_name = 'Central Station', city = 'Los Angeles', state = 'CA', power_rating = 150 WHERE station_id = 101

UPDATE charging_station_stats SET usage_count=usage_count+1, last_used=NOW() WHERE station_id=3
